## Runtime.start() method

Starts this project. All `app`<!-- -->s(usually only one) which should be active will be mounted to the `document`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
start(rms: RuntimeModule[], base: string): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rms | [RuntimeModule](./runtime.runtimemodule.md)<!-- -->\[\] | [Runtime.modules](./runtime.runtime.modules.md) |
|  base | string | [Runtime.base](./runtime.runtime.base.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

Technically, with `rms` and `base`<!-- -->, we can create `importmap` dynamicly. But for performance and compatibility, we leave it to user who should provide `importmap` staticly. Usually, you will use this lib with `@ugdu/packer` which will do that for you.
